rules_text: Creatures you control with flying have cooperation with that ability. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, and trample. [i](Whenever you attack, you may tap the creature with cooperation. If you do, all attacking Allies and up to one attacking non-Ally gain the cooperation ability until end of turn.)[/i]
